Class Board

java.lang.Object
domain.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the game board in a tower-defense style game such as Plants vs. Zombies. The board consists of a grid of cells where plants and zombies are placed and interact.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Board(int initialSunPoints, int initialBrainPoints)
    Constructs a new Board with the specified initial sun points and brain points.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int initialSunPoints, int initialBrainPoints)
      Constructs a new Board with the specified initial sun points and brain points. Initializes the game board with an empty grid of cells and sets up the lawn mowers and zombies list.
      Parameters:
      initialSunPoints - the initial number of sun points available for the game.
      initialBrainPoints - the initial number of brain points available for the game.

  • Method Details

    • getRows

      public int getRows()
      Retrieves the number of rows in the board.
      Returns:
      the total number of rows available on the board.

    • getColumns

      public int getColumns()
      Retrieves the number of columns in the board.
      Returns:
      the total number of columns available on the board.

    • getSunPoints

      public int getSunPoints()
      Retrieves the current number of sun points available on the board.
      Returns:
      the current sun points as an integer.

    • getBrainPoints

      public int getBrainPoints()
      Retrieves the current number of brain points available in the game.
      Returns:
      the current brain points as an integer.

    • placePlant

      public boolean placePlant(Plant plant, int row, int col)
      Places a plant at the specified position on the board if the position is valid and the cell is empty.
      Parameters:
      plant - the Plant object to be placed on the board.
      row - the row index where the plant will be placed.
      col - the column index where the plant will be placed.
      Returns:
      true if the plant was successfully placed, false otherwise.

    • placeZombie

      public boolean placeZombie(Zombies zombie, int row, int col)
      Places the specified zombie at the given row and column on the board if the position is valid and the cell is empty.
      Parameters:
      zombie - the Zombie object to be placed on the board.
      row - the row index where the zombie should be placed.
      col - the column index where the zombie should be placed.
      Returns:
      true if the zombie was successfully placed, false otherwise.

    • moveZombies

      public void moveZombies()
      Moves all zombies on the board that are capable of movement. Iterates through each cell starting from the rightmost column towards the left in each row, checking for the presence of zombies in each cell. If a zombie is found and it is an instance of the Movement class, the zombie's move behavior is invoked. The move behavior allows the zombie to move to an adjacent cell or commence attack on a nearby plant if one is present. Zombies move leftward in their respective rows, following the movement rules defined in the Movement class.

    • handlePodadora

      public static boolean handlePodadora(int row)
      Handles the activation of the lawn mower for the specified row. If the lawn mower in the given row is active, it clears all zombies in that row and deactivates the lawn mower. Otherwise, it returns the state of the lawn mower.
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the row in the game board to handle the lawn mower activation.
      Returns:
      false if the lawn mower was activated and zombies were cleared, true if the lawn mower was already inactive.

    • winner

      public static boolean winner()
      Determines if any lawn mower has been activated during the game. Iterates through a predefined number of rows, invoking the handlePodadora method for each row to check if the lawn mower was triggered.
      Returns:
      true if any lawn mower was activated, false otherwise.

    • getPlantByName

      public Plant getPlantByName(String plantName)
      Retrieves a specific plant object by its name. The method takes the name of a plant as input and returns a corresponding Plant object instance. If the plant name does not match any of the predefined plant types, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      plantName - the name of the plant to retrieve. Must be one of the predefined plant names: "Sunflower", "Peashooter", "WallNut", "PotatoMine", "ECIPlant", or "Evolve".
      Returns:
      a Plant object corresponding to the specified name.
      Throws:
      POOBvsZOMBIESException - if the provided plant name is not recognized.

    • getZombieByName

      public Zombies getZombieByName(String zombieName)
      Retrieves a specific type of zombie based on its name. The method returns a new instance of a zombie class corresponding to the provided name. If the name does not match any predefined zombie type, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      zombieName - the name of the zombie to retrieve. Valid names are: "Basic", "Conehead", "Buckethead", "Brainstein", "ECIZombie".
      Returns:
      a Zombies object corresponding to the specified name.
      Throws:
      POOBvsZOMBIESException - if the specified name does not match any known zombie type.

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(int row, int i)
      Retrieves the Cell object located at the specified row and column on the game board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the desired cell.
      i - the column index of the desired cell.
      Returns:
      the Cell object at the specified row and column.

    • removeZombie

      public void removeZombie(int row, int col)
      Removes a zombie from the specified cell on the board if a zombie is present.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the cell from which the zombie should be removed.
      col - the column index of the cell from which the zombie should be removed.

    • addZombie

      public boolean addZombie(Zombies zombie, int row, int col)
      Adds a zombie to the specified position on the board if the position is valid and the cell is empty. Updates the board state by adding the zombie to the cell and the internal list of zombies.
      Parameters:
      zombie - the Zombies object to be added to the board.
      row - the row index where the zombie will be placed.
      col - the column index where the zombie will be placed.
      Returns:
      true if the zombie was successfully added to the board, false otherwise.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty(int row, int col)
      Determines if the specified cell on the board is empty. A cell is considered empty if it is within valid board boundaries and does not contain any plant or zombie.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the cell to check.
      col - the column index of the cell to check.
      Returns:
      true if the cell is valid and empty, false otherwise.

    • getPlantAt

      public Plant getPlantAt(int row, int col)
      Retrieves the Plant object located at the specified row and column on the game board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the position from which the plant should be retrieved.
      col - the column index of the position from which the plant should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the Plant object located at the specified row and column, or null if no plant is present.

    • removePlantWithShovel

      public boolean removePlantWithShovel(int row, int col)
      Attempts to remove a plant from the specified position on the board using a shovel. The removal occurs only if the position is valid and a plant exists in the cell.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the cell from which the plant should be removed.
      col - the column index of the cell from which the plant should be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the plant was successfully removed, false otherwise.
